name: Whitewash (Itch)
description:
The revolution devours its children, they say. Your job is to make sure it goes down that way.Frantic shooting, coarse language, aggressive soundtrack... this is a rather short but intense twin-stick shooter game.
Whitewash was originally released as an html5 game on a couple game portals. The version you're about to play was improved with gamepad support, a better CRT shader and a few more tweaks which results in a much better --and ad-free, experience.Enjoy, tell us what you like, what could be improved and thank you for your support! Visit us at gravedangergames.com
